sendTab.title: Slanje
sendTab.shareIntentInfo: Možeš takodje da koristiš i "Share" opciju tvog mobilnog uredjaja da bi lakše selektovao fajlove.
sendTab.help: Molim uveri se da je željena destinacija takodje na istoj WiFi mreži.

network.title: Mreža
network.needRestart: Restartuj server da bi Podešavanja bila primenjena!
network.portWarning: Možda nećete biti pronadjeni od strane drugih uredjaja jer koristite custom Port.(default: {defaultPort})
network.multicastGroupWarning: Možda nećete biti pronadjeni od strane drugih uredjaja jer koristite custom multicast adresu. (default: {defaultMulticast})

troubleshootPage.title: Troubleshoot
troubleshootPage.subTitle: Does the app not work as expected? Here you can find some common solutions.

firewall.symptom: This app can send files to other devices; but other devices cannot send files to this device.
firewall.solution: This is most likely a firewall issue. You can solve this by allowing incoming connections (UDP and TCP) on port {port}.

noConnection.symptom: Both devices cannot discover each other nor can they share files.
noConnection.solution: Does the problem exist on both sides? If so, you need to make sure that both devices are on the same Wi-Fi network and share the same configuration (port, multicast address, encryption). The network may not allow communication between participants. In this case, this option must be enabled on the router.

subTitle.one: wants to send you a file

receivePage.canceled: The sender has canceled the request.

receiveOptionsPage.title: Options
receiveOptionsPage.saveToGalleryOff: Turned off automatically because there are directories.

sendPage.rejected: The recipient has rejected the request.
sendPage.busy: The recipient is busy with another request.

webSharePage.title: Share via link
webSharePage.error: An error occurred while starting the server.

openLink.one: Open this link in your browser:
openLink.other: Open one of these links in your browser:

webSharePage.encryptionHint: LocalSend uses a self-signed certificate. You need to accept it in your browser.

aboutPage.title: About LocalSend
description: LocalSend is a free, open-source app that allows you to securely share files and messages with nearby devices over your local network without needing an internet connection.
This app is available on Android, iOS, macOS, Windows and Linux. You can find all download options on the official homepage.
aboutPage.author: Author

donationPage.title: Donate
donationPage.info: LocalSend is free, open-source and without any ads. If you like the app, you can support the development with a donation.

aliasGenerator(ignoreMissing, ignoreGpt).@info: Different locales may have different words, it may not match 1:1
aliasGenerator(ignoreMissing, ignoreGpt).@combination: In some languages, the adjective must be last.

addFile.title: Add to selection
addFile.content: What do you want to add?

cancelSession.title: Cancel file transfer
cancelSession.content: Do you really want to cancel the file transfer?

cannotOpenFile.title: Cannot open file
cannotOpenFile.content: Could not open "{file}". Has this file been moved, renamed or deleted?

encryptionDisabledNotice.title: Encryption disabled
encryptionDisabledNotice.content: Communication now takes place via the unencrypted HTTP protocol. To use HTTPS, enable encryption again.

favoriteDeleteDialog.title: Delete from favorites
favoriteDeleteDialog.content: Do you really want to delete from favorites "{name}"?

historyClearDialog.title: Clear history
historyClearDialog.content: Do you really want to delete the entire history?

localNetworkUnauthorized.title: @:dialogs.noPermission.title
localNetworkUnauthorized.description: LocalSend can't find other devices without having the permission to scan the local network. Please grant this permission in the settings.

noFiles.title: No file selected
noFiles.content: Please select at least one file.

noPermission.title: No permission
noPermission.content: You have not granted the necessary permissions. Please grant them in the settings.

notAvailableOnPlatform.title: Not available
notAvailableOnPlatform.content: This feature is only available on:

quickSaveNotice.title: @:general.quickSave
quickSaveNotice.content: File requests are automatically accepted. Be aware that everyone on the local network can send you files.

sendModeHelp.title: Send modes
sendModeHelp.single: Sends files to one recipient. Selection will be cleared after finished file transfer.
sendModeHelp.multiple: Sends files to multiple recipients. Selection will not be cleared.
sendModeHelp.link: Recipients who do not have LocalSend installed can download the selected files by opening the link in their browser.

tray.@info: Apple Guidelines are very strict about the 'close' wording.

assetPicker.@info: Translations for the Media selection tool for Android and iPhone
assetPicker.unableToAccessAll: Unable to access all files on the device
assetPicker.viewingLimitedAssetsTip: Only view files and albums accessible to the app.
assetPicker.accessAllTip: App can only access some files on the device. Go to system settings and allow the app to access all media on the device.
